title: Action Adventure Fantasy Game OST
description: 10 Original high quality orchestral tracks, 20 files.
longDescription:
Link to the demos!


Action Adventure Fantasy Game OST is a collection of 10 orchestral tracks written for JRPG, RPG or adventure games in general. The music will fit different in-game location adding mostly a dark and fantastical mood, there are also some brighter tracks and a couple of energetic action oriented tracks.

The music was written for orchestra including a string section, woodwind section, piano, marimba, vibraphone, harp and a percussion section.


This pack includes 10 tracks, each with a loop edit for convenience: 

All tracks are .wav, 44.1kHz, 16 bits


  • A Legend is Born (2:13)
  • A Legend is Born - Loop (2:04)
  • Boss Battle (2:02)
  • Boss Battle - Loop (1:57)
  • Dangerous Encounters (2:06)
  • Dangerous Encounters - Loop (1:58)
  • Enchanted Forest (2:19)
  • Enchanted Forest - Loop (2:10)
  • Evil is Lurking (1:01)
  • Evil is Lurking - Loop (0:59)
  • Forbidden Secrets (2:05)
  • Forbidden Secrets - Loop (1:55)
  • Mysterious Deeps (2:04)
  • Mysterious Deeps - Loop (2:00)
  • Myths and Legends (2:02)
  • Myths and Legends - Loop (1:55)
  • Peaceful Village (2:04)
  • Peaceful Village - Loop (1:58)
  • Strange Land (2:15)
  • Strange Land - Loop (2:13)
technicalDetails:

  •  10 Original high quality orchestral tracks
  •  10 Loop ready edits
